meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'postfix'

languageKey.label: Path to the folder with the e-mail drafts
Email of the postfix admin
Default quota limit (in megabyte)
Send the warning message, if quota is over
Delete mails and send a message, if quota is over
Postfix quota task
The Postfix quota task checks each Postfix account for quota limits. It send s warn mails and delete mails over limit.
Test mode
Disabled (Warning message will sent, e-mails over quota will deleted)
Enabled (postfix admin will get the report "Which will happen")
Postfix test task
The Postfix test task just sends a mail to a given email address. It is designed to be used for testing purposes.
Please enter an email adress.
Postfix Quota
Postfix Quota überwacht Mail-Konten. Postfix Quota versendet Warn-Mails und löscht Mails, wenn das Quota Limit überschritten ist.
E-Mail des Postfix-Adninistrators
Postfix Test-Job
Der Postfix Test-Job sendet lediglich eine Mail zu der angegebenen E-Mail-Adresse. Der Job dient nur Test-Zwecken.
Bitte gebe eine Mail-Adresse an.
